TopicTitle: What's the best way to customize the tech-tree in 1.0?

Articles.Content:
It looks like 1.0 changed the techtree to use a cfg file. I'm trying to figure out how to create an entirely new techtree, but I haven't been able to.

I tried using [Nelien's Tech Tree Editor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98942-WIN-TED-KSP-Tech-Tree-Editor-v0-2-4-ALPHA-EARLY-TESTING), but I haven't been able to get it to work with 1.0.

What's the best way to mess with the tech tree? Is there a GUI I can use? Moving around nodes by using the coordinate system in notepad and then checking by booting up the game would be really time-consuming, and I wouldn't know how to move the parts to new nodes.
